website_summaries.verdict: Between this paintball mask’s top-tier comfort, high level of customizability, wide vision range, rugged design, and array of design options, there is a lot to appreciate about the Extend Pro.
pros: Large mask for extra protection and comfort
Available in a wide range of colors
cons: The color, lens combinations, and prices of the Extend Pro vary wildly online, so good luck finding your favorite design

customer_reviews.title: Virtue Vio Contour
customer_reviews.text: Paid 109.95 for the Black and Silver goggles. I'm a little disappointed because the goggles look nothing like the photograph presented on amazon. The mask lacks the gray highlights or accents as seen in the picture, additionally the lense didn't come as seen in the photograph. The lense is a basic black tint not the smoke mirror like finish as seen in the photograph. this package just arrived an hour ago, and you can tell it was opened and re-taped. Lastly, there are defects in the lense Tint,right out of the box there are noticeable bubbles along the top outer edge. I'm disappointed, 100 bucks should get you a quality goggle /product
customer_reviews.author: Sir Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Virtue Vio excellent paintball goggle
customer_reviews.text: The VIO is an exceptional paintball mask with a large field of vision and a tint on the glass perfect to reflect the Florida sun. The ventilation is well done and when I’m running it does not fog up the lens. There are much more detailed reviews on youtube regarding the Virtue Vio and I recommend you check them out. This is a higher end mask and it's true what they say about you get what you pay for. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Mazak

customer_reviews.title: Take a shot to the throat
customer_reviews.text: Such a beaut, I dont know if I want to play with this thing or use it for cosplay. I'll use it. Virtue makes a great product, the Extend is probably my favorite mask, the flexible jaw shield reduces ball break and still provides great protection. This model is good for guys who have a strong (big) jaw, covers it completely while maintaining style, ventilation and most importantly, protection. The coolest feature of this model is the ability to interchange pieces for either added protection or color swap. If youre afraid of taking a pearl necklace, maybe look for a neck guard.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Crytpobits

customer_reviews.title: Excellent anti-fog, breathability and light-weight feels like nothing at all
customer_reviews.text: Glad I did my research and got the XS II. I wanted the extra ear padding and it pays off. This mask is so comfortable and snug that it feels like wearing a great pair sunglasses. Excellent viewing room, can see everywhere. I like that it's customizable overtime. I've taken several headshots now and with a handy rag, this mask and lens cleans up nicely between rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Fleiner

customer_reviews.title: The mask is excellent, definitely more comfortable than the Dye I4 goggle ...
customer_reviews.text: The mask is excellent, definitely more comfortable than the Dye I4 goggle system. Unfortunately Amazon.com messed up my order and sent me the wrong mask color scheme. With some quick emails/phone calls i'm sure this can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: great design-excellent unit
customer_reviews.text: you will not be disappointed at any feature of this mask for any reason. comfortable, stylish, great coverage, light weight, great vision portal. i added the visor and the fan. it worked out great. there was rain for two hours.... guess who could still see??? yep.. this guy... all others who weren't using this great unit could not see. So.. if you can't see.. you are a target.... I kept the fan on the entire time i was wearing this mask.. 5 hours.. it worked fantastic. I plan to use this on a high speed fishing boat and also hunting and being outside in the snow...
customer_reviews.author: William Hertsenberg

customer_reviews.title: I love this mask !
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a Contour II since they were introduced so I finally got one. This has all of the options that you want and the ability to customize is a bonus that other companies miss. I'll be buying an HD BK lens soon thanks for making great gear only gripe no Virtue sticker? 🤔
customer_reviews.author: G. Ro.

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. Love the color, just didn't plan well since we primarily play woodsball and the blue really sticks out! Easy to take apart and clean. Facemask is soft, 1st shot I took felt like I took the full force of the hit, actually got a bloody lip. Visor has held up well after several hits. I ordered a black facemask to swap out when in the woods, but overall I really like this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L Ropers

customer_reviews.title: Works well but does not cover forehead
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a force-on-force class that I took. For the parts of your head that it does cover, it works well. I had a gap between the top of this mask and my forehead and got nailed on my forehead. Bled like a pig. There are other designs that provide more complete coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS!!!  Perfect fit for those with large grapes!
customer_reviews.text: I've got a large head, size 8, and I've got some extra weight as well, which can give me those "jowls" on the cheek/neck. I bought this mask after reading several reviews, and let me tell you, this is the most comfortable, best ventilated, widest field of view I could ask for. I use it primarily for taking photos of my son and his team during events, but I play woodsball occasionally. The ear pieces don't smash into the side of my head, and the lower mouth guard is soft and flexible. The foam is super plush. This mask performed flawlessly, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Zell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!, but one thing though...
customer_reviews.text: I love these goggles!!! They are amazingly comfortable and impossible to fog. Great lens and just overall high quality. You get what you pay for. My only reason I am giving it 4 stars is because it just barely covers my entire face. I wish that it was a little longer from cheek to jaw. Other than that, This is AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Evan H.

customer_reviews.title: Could use some more vertically
customer_reviews.text: The mask I feel could be a little bigger vertical wise, I have it either on the top of my head so I can’t get shot on my forehead but then my chin is exposed. And then if I have it down to cover my chin my whole forehead is exposed. Just needs about an inch added on in my opinion. Could be my face tho. Lol. Other than that no problems, fits comfortably and doesn’t fog, even after hours of hot gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great mask for the price! I was torn between VForce, Dye i5, and Vios. Pulled the trigger on this mask because virtue has always made great products and never had a problem with them. Mask lense were easy to change. Just took some time to break in the buckles ,but changing the lense will get really easy later on I'll promise that. Took me only 2 minutes! This mask didn't let me down. Great vision, great ventilation for breathing and heat. Easy to change mask parts so it always feels fresh and brand new. Never fogged. What more can you ask? Buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mask. Very lightweight and offers a great field ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mask. Very lightweight and offers a great field of vision. It stays on no matter how hard I run or dive. The lens removal is extremely easy. I was debating between this and the Dye i4 but chose this because the Dye i4 was a little small where it did not offer protection for the bottom of my jaw. If u have a small head/face then get the i4 because I think it looks nicer but if you have an average size head/face like mine then I suggest this mask. This comes with a mask dust bag and a lens dust bag in case you need to carry around additional lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Keith T. Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Great mask! ...gave me the wrong color though.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most expensive top of the line masks on the market. I love the mask however I don't love the way they messed up my order. I ordered the Black Silver mask and ended up getting a Black Olive green one. Paying this much for a mask I would expect to get my order right. Also whoever put the mask together messed up. The foam ear pieces weren't right and didn't fit in the right spot. But.... errors aside, this is one of the best masks you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Dye i5
customer_reviews.text: It's a shame that everyone thinks the Dye i5 is the mask to have. This vio extend is brilliant. Is comfy, breathes better, cheaper becauseyou can find a deal on it, cheaper lenses if you look. The only negative, mounting an action cam isn't as easy as the dye and that ratchet system is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: No fog. Enough said.
customer_reviews.text: First day I played with them we had one of those wonderful New Jersey, 100% humidity days and this lens never fogged once. It was awesome! Friend has a v-force grill, and it fogged up on him every other game... Sooo it's safe to say who makes the better lens out of those two options. Field of vision is great, you can use your peripherals easily, the sides of the mask are not blocking your view. Very light weight and foam is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: tom.m

customer_reviews.title: Best mask in paintball.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best paintball mask I have ever used. My i4 lens broke and my friend let me barrow his VIO and I was instantly sold. Man am I glad my i4 broke! This mask is very breathable and comfortable and provides a great field of view. The lense is a bit dark for indoor play though. Its not the easiest mask to take apart, but once you figure it out its not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask....just the wrong one sent....:(
customer_reviews.text: I love the mask....the only thing is...you sent the wrong mask ...you sent me a black and purple vio...not the graphic amethyst .....and by other reviews it seems like this happens a lot ...awesome mask either way though...but for $150.00 I would expect the mask to be the right one...
customer_reviews.author: Braddddddddiiieeeeeeeee

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting goggles with perfect clarity !
customer_reviews.text: Mask fits great, light and sleek protection... I love the color and the performance of the lenses... Eye fatigue is a minimum during bright sunny days; clarity is excellent. Goggles are a great deal for the money, form, fit and performance are second to none !
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and very light weight. My son loves it. Very nice quality and works great. Son has been tagged on the mask several times and has held up good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great field of view
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it. covers whole face and jaw on the extend at least. Great field of view. Can hear relatively good. Never fogged up and I sweat and have a hot head and play in humid heat so it would have fogged if it was going to, trust me. I just wish it came with the visor for the price
customer_reviews.author: Dubso

customer_reviews.title: Buy nice or buy twice
customer_reviews.text: A big step up from my 10 year old JT Flexes. I was afraid to buy these because I'm only a rec player and felt like I didn't need a "fancy" mask. However, when it comes to masks, you really don't want to skimp out. I am in love with these googles. The color, the fit, and the protection are all perfect. I'm not really sure how Virtue can improve on these guys, it's no wonder they are a favorite among players.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit over my glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great fit over my glasses, with the thermal lens they didn’t fog AT ALL during gameplay. They are extremely difficult to disassemble the first few times. I needed to install the chin strap and remove the lens film by slightly taking it apart and it wasn’t as quick of a process as they show in the how-to videos. Still 5 stars, but maybe they should install the chin strap from the factory since it’s required at pretty much every field.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great mask, fits larger heads
customer_reviews.text: Best mask if you have a big head, I wear a size 8 fitted hat and this mask fits great. No fogging and the Chromatic lenses work great for playing in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: roberto arreola

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This mask was well worth the moeny, being a very large paintball player finding a mask that would let me play long sessions without fogging or be uncomfortable was a challenge. These preformed better than expected on a day where we had rain and humidity all day, only time it fogged was when a bit of water got inside from all the rain, dried it off and good as new, highly recommended for anyone needed a mask for any situation!!
customer_reviews.author: andrew levengood

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money 💰
customer_reviews.text: 100% love it 😁❤️ Pretty much feels apart of ur face and I love the design Pros- 1. Small 2. Comfortable 3. Affordable 4. Very customizable 5. Lots of colors 6. Easy cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Christopher soto

customer_reviews.title: Great google system
customer_reviews.text: Great google system...I've owned quite a few systems through my years of paintball and I've got to say this one takes the cake. Super easy to replace goggle lens, super light weight and comfortable, and much easier to hear as there's minimal echo effect. If you're on the fence about whether to buy this goggle, stop hesitating and pull the trigger.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Fits a closer to the face than my ProFlex but very comfortable. Easy to hear. Easy to change the lens. I did a lot of research through all the current goggles available and landed on this. I have a bigger face and need that extra little bit of protection, which almost every other mask does not offer. Highly recommend to anyone looking for that next mask upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i have a long face, it covers me very well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mask that has plenty of padding and is very comfortable. i have used it for 1 season so far and have had no issues with fitment or fogging. Buy this and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality super fast shipping only flaw to this mask is that it is a half centimeter too small my chin stick out a Lil bit but nothing dramatic all around a good mask can't wait to use it :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great. Played for about 5 hours and was breathing ...
customer_reviews.text: Great. Played for about 5 hours and was breathing heavy, this mask didn't fog once. Was considerably breathable too, good faceplate venting. No problem with hearing or communicating. Took a few to the face and no noticeable scratches on the lens. wiped clean with a microfiber no problem and lens removal is simple. Was comfortable, felt light on my face, nothing bad to say.
customer_reviews.author: JayJayJet

customer_reviews.title: I'd say this is the best mask I've owned to date
customer_reviews.text: I'd say this is the best mask I've owned to date. The vision is so clear I found myself still wearing them after I exit the field. The only con with this mask is trying to take off the lens. The button you have to push down on requires more pressure than my thumb can bear. I had to use tools to get the job done. But being that this isn't done often I gave it a good rating. P.s. if you have an egg head like me put some padding inside your hat because like all masks... they just don't pretect the forehead and I have two welts to prove it. See you sucker on the field!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect. Chromatic lens is the emerald tint
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. Chromatic lens is the emerald tint. Pretty good contrast with the lens. Though I have yet to try it in the woods since it is Feb. First virtue mask I have owned and I am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Woodyard

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and it came with a smoke lens .
customer_reviews.text: Nice mask if you look in the pic my son and I both have one mine is red his is blue so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J&C Moore

customer_reviews.title: Best vision of any mask
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all of the mask available and this mask takes the cake in terms of vision. No glare as with the I4 and better optics than everything else available. Still waiting for a lens that has the optical quality of Oakley snowboarding lens but I probably shouldn't hold my breath
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I got the contour II direct from the manufacturer for 79 dollars. It is a such a wonderful mask and blow my other masks out of the water. To me a good mask is more important then a top shelf marker. If you want to upgrade your game, start with a great mask like this one and then expand from there.
customer_reviews.author: William Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The best mask i have ever used i love it
customer_reviews.text: The best mask i have ever used i love it. make everything a nice shade easy to breath and doesn't fog up. i would recommend this mask to anyone and i have even to people just looking to start paintball
customer_reviews.author: William Lahrmer

customer_reviews.title: Prescription glasses didn't fog!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who wears glasses, my continual problem is that my glasses always fog when renting equipment. I bought these as an occasional rec player looking to avoid my glasses fogging and they worked perfectly. Great fit, comfortable, and no fogging on a cold 40 degree day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have fogging issues get this mask. I ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have fogging issues get this mask. I play airsoft in a swamp in FL even in August it didn't fog. I need to wear a mask because I also wear glasses which with the ventilation didn't fog either.
customer_reviews.author: hf

customer_reviews.title: Over priced mask with a defect?
customer_reviews.text: For the price you would expect good quality made, but came with a defect on the ear padding snap button,on one side is snap into place and on the other button completely bent around the edge unable to clip on..im like wow..I like the mask its cool and camo overall but dissatisfying with the defect.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Forney,TX

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Perfect. But need a new lens on day 1.
customer_reviews.text: Got this in the mail 2 days ago, used it for the first time today. Amazingly comfortable fit, but my first shot to the face from d1 while I was running up center totally put a 1/2” crack in the center of my brand new lens. Kinda bummed about the lens, but gee wiz this lens swapping system works perfect. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Mask!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, super comfortable, and well it just looks awesome. I wear glasses and mine fit perfectly inside the mask. They don't even touch the lens of the mask. I can't say that would be the case for everyone who wears glasses, but it was an awesome surprise for me. Breathability is insanely great. So yeah, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Frights

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to the future of masks!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Zero fog and Is very comfortable. I would love to see Virtue give hard cases for this instead of a bag though
customer_reviews.author: matt crawford

customer_reviews.title: Solid mask
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic mask. Although it is pricey, it is worth it, it balances the low profile/comfort/style of the i4's without leaving your chin exposed, Haven't had it fog yet and removing/inserting lenses becomes quite easy once you get used to it/ break in the mask. The mask is comfortable but for this price range they all are... I wasn't able to try this mask on before buying it and i don't at all regret the purchase nor have i had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Big Heads/Faces don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: This mask was extra tight on the temples and was not comfortable at all. Also the item was sold as new but looked used. The mask was just thrown in the box with the half of the original packaging. Not satisfied at all with the transaction I returned it with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: 8 year old

customer_reviews.title: I thought the mask was amazing till the first time it took paint to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought the mask was amazing till the first time it took paint to the lenses which spydered around impact location. Then realized the two lenses where seperating and customer support is very lazy and hard to get a hold of. I would recomend dye
customer_reviews.author: Kyle s.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good mask but a tiny bit small for my taste
customer_reviews.text: Well it took me a long time to purchase this mask. I bounced back and forth between it and the extended facemask.. This is a very good mask but a tiny bit small for my taste.. I didn't realize the forehead and jaw would be exposed that much.. but with a head band on it should be great mask.. only thing I found out is buying the extend lower facesmask is harder to buy separately compared to this masks lower piece
customer_reviews.author: Briar Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I have a melon of a head. These cover ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a melon of a head. These cover my face with no problems. They are quite comfy and have yet to fog up on me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wood

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product, super confortable mask, i have 14 years playing paintball. And so far this is one of the most comfortable mask I’ve owned. And as added value tons of customization options available.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Jones

customer_reviews.title: the mask design is great, the mask quality is great
customer_reviews.text: the mask design is great, the mask quality is great, but the packing was terrible, my box was squashed and my mask was a little bent, for that 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jose/Karen

customer_reviews.title: Better than DYE for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! no more fog. Fits perfectly and I have a relatively big sized head. Audio is super clear. more protection than a DYE mask too.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar C.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading colors, great mask
customer_reviews.text: This mask has all the right things going for it. The only reason I gave it 3 and not five is the color is very misleading
customer_reviews.author: KS-gamer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask
customer_reviews.text: Played with it twice so far. This past Saturday it rained on our way to the field so I don't know if that had a factor but it did fog up. If it hadn't done that it'd be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonTide07

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! My son has no complaints at all about ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! My son has no complaints at all about these goggles. Work exactly as advertised and he gets compliments on them every time he is on the field!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask great field of view, can hear and be heard quite well.
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you're trying to paintball on the cheap, this should protect your face and wallet.
customer_reviews.author: patrick boyd

customer_reviews.title: this is hands down the most comfortable and easiest to breath in mask I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I am a bigger guy (6'2" 230lbs), and primarily play day long scenarios. Coming from V-Force Grills and Morph masks, as well as Dye I4s, this is hands down the most comfortable and easiest to breath in mask I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Lake

customer_reviews.title: Good visability for a standard anti-fog mask
customer_reviews.text: Good mask I just wish I had the fan kit as I did on previous masks.
customer_reviews.author: Muad'Dib

customer_reviews.title: The clarity is amazing on this mask I run with my sly profit ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesomeness!! The clarity is amazing on this mask I run with my sly profit usually and I will say out of box my sly is more comfortable but this mask beats it out on its clarity! It is comfortable still and I have good clarity as well verbally!! All in all great mask!!
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Durability
customer_reviews.text: probably the most comfortable mask i have ever worn. fits the face really well. just the right amount of ventilation so breathe and not get paint in the mouth. and can't beat their color patterns. the BEST mask in the market. you get what you pay for. worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Grinstead

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have ‘em!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of Vio’s and these are better then the first! Gotta have them!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Good protection but looks cool enough for my son!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 11 year old. It offers good protection, the fit was good as expected and he really liked the colors and design.
customer_reviews.author: BB mom

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Mask fits well and visibility is superb. Color is muted but still stylish. Great overall quality. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Foote

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The field of view was smaller then expected based on the image
customer_reviews.author: Jake N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mask
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask, it feels great and i almost forget that i am wearing it, it was delivered faster than planned which was great, and the package and mask came without a scratch, would higly recomend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christian H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best gogles ever specially for a big guy like me
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Intense running
customer_reviews.text: I like the mask for using it extensively running hard with it that it doesn’t fog at all. The only problem is when I was running it would come loose every now and again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bailey Myers

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. It confirms nicely to my face while ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It confirms nicely to my face while leaving a lot of breathing room. The lenses easily come out to clean and store. It does take Some tack to get use to the lense release system. The field of vision is wonderful! I love this mask over my Dye I4
customer_reviews.author: Lori Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!!! But a few things to know
customer_reviews.text: Great mask worth the dollar few things that were disturbing and disappointing first the mask had a bent shape to it on the front and the package had been opened before I got like somebody open during shipping
customer_reviews.author: Mr.stitch

customer_reviews.title: Big Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: Great mask, high quality, and I would definitely recommend to those starting out and even to seasoned players.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrad Scott

customer_reviews.title: This ones are by far the best.. Get them
customer_reviews.text: I had the i4s before , half of my chin would show up .. This ones are by far the best .. Get them!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Over pleasantly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mask. Great lengths to cover the jaw. Great Vision radius. Fits my big head perfectly. Just wish they made a head protector visor thingy
customer_reviews.author: Victor A. Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: hmm
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, but lens came with scratches.... scratch right in the middle and it seems to be used or was not new at all...
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: It definitely enhanced my performance. It feels super comfortable, it helps wuth the sun, and it is easy to disassemble. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin R.

customer_reviews.title: does not fog at all and super comfortable. I was debating on the contour or ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and they are badass, does not fog at all and super comfortable. I was debating on the contour or the extend, I have a fairly big face I guess so I got the extend and it's only about 3/4" longer and it's perfect. Love em love em!!
customer_reviews.author: Shnidz

customer_reviews.title: Not the same mask pictured for tactical snow
customer_reviews.text: Love it but not the same mask pictured. The main frame is still white but they changed the bottoms from white with black to black with white so its opposite of what it looks like in the picture. Still a great mask and would recommend to anybody. just be aware virtue no longer produces the tactical snow that is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask!!!! Point blank allows me to breathe on the field!!!
customer_reviews.author: Itsfeebzman

customer_reviews.title: It is hands down the best looking mask out there (IMHO)
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves this mask at the field I play at. It is hands down the best looking mask out there (IMHO). Pros: -comfortable -lightweight -breathable (coming from a sly profit) -great field of view! Cons: -Single strap design (but can modify it to function with 2 straps) -A little on the short side (plenty of exposed jaw), but they have an extended version out that covers about an inch more
customer_reviews.author: darensdorff

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with my vio. I played paintball in a steam room while wearing a sauna suit and they still didn't fog up
customer_reviews.author: Andres Ponce

customer_reviews.title: There are better options.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement of my old Dye i4s. These are definitely not the replacement. The mask fogs up and is a lot wider and larger compared to the i4s.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again in a heart beat
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to get leftover paint out of all the little crevices but above all else, I absolutely love the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Tackett

customer_reviews.title: ... fit too tight or too loose but these fit perfect on my face
customer_reviews.text: some Goggles fit too tight or too loose but these fit perfect on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mask. Just like a i4. It's very easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves his mask. It's a little to big for him, but he wouldn't let me return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy de la Torre

customer_reviews.title: This is the best mask I have found so far for anyone with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mask I have found so far for anyone with a larger face that needs more coverage for their jaw line and chin. It is very easy to breathe because the mask isn't tight against your face like other masks I've owned or tried on. Great field of view and nice fit and coverage.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: love it, great fit
customer_reviews.text: love it, great fit. its nice that all of the coloring for the lens frames are different so it makes your mask unique.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan l.

customer_reviews.title: Best mask ever
customer_reviews.text: Best mask I have ever owned, it fits snug and it covers my face and ears completely without compromising it's low profile. Would recommend to anyone who has $100 just laying around
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great mask, but not as big as I thought a mask with "Extend" in its name, would be...
customer_reviews.text: I do like this mask and is now my go to mask (I have a pair of eflexes and i4s). Great range of vision and very comfy. Also, it has the best/ easiest dis-assembly/ lens replacement process. However, my only issue (though very slight) is that is isn't as big as I was expecting. I'm a bigger guy with a big head/face. Seeing the description, I thought, "Finally, a mask that will fully cover me up and then some!" That's why I went with the Extend version. The coverage is relatively similar to Eflexes or Grillz. Which isn't bad at all. I was just expecting more.
customer_reviews.author: M Slender

customer_reviews.title: Just AMAZEBALLZZ
customer_reviews.text: came fast and packaged so beautiful i hate taking it out. But i am the envy of everyone out there in the field. JUST LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks amazing have yet to try it out in the field ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when desired. It looks amazing have yet to try it out in the field but as far as fitment and general build quality worth the price
customer_reviews.author: isaac

customer_reviews.title: One Good, One bad!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them and only one had the right lens,I was really dissapointed in the fact that the second one had a purple lens. Boxes were opened and really beat up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: The only time this fogged up was after it rained.

customer_reviews.title: They're cool man
customer_reviews.text: Great seller and product. Prompt, accurate and quality. Don't hesitate to do business with.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great mask, using it for airsoft - comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great mask, using it for airsoft - comfortable, no fogging issues, acoustics are fine, it sits a little off the mouth/chin area which is nice. No issues aiming down red dot.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mask as a Christmas gift for my son and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: sjaranyi

customer_reviews.title: but I love this mask
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but I love this mask. It has amazing breathablity and has yet to fog on me! Played about 5 days in it so far, and love it every time!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Fast fast fast
customer_reviews.text: Came in fast mask is new as described awesome mask can't wait to use it this weekend thanks virtue great vender don't be afraid to buy from
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfort
customer_reviews.text: The only mask I'll own. So many ways to change em up. Most comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mask. Covers your entire face well, but doesn't feel to constrictive. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

product_meta.title: Virtue VIO Paintball Goggles/Masks with Dual Pane Thermal Anti-Fog Lenses
product_meta.description: The Virtue VIO is the most comfortable paintball mask ever designed, featuring a quick change, fog resistant thermal lens, and an innovative versatile design that allows the player to easily change out every aspect of the goggle from the face mask to the foam, ear pads, goggle strap, and lens.
feature_bullets: [Built To Win] - VIO lens technology improves visibility and provides large field of view | Streamlined semi-flexible facemask reinforced with rigid color accents
[More Secure] - 3D Foam Molded Pro Pad adds grip, comfort, and protection | Enlarged goggle strap | Upgraded adjusters make adjustments easy
[High End Comfort] - Lightweight no echo ear pads increase acoustics as well as comfort | Direct mouth vents breathe easier and transmit voice clearly | Replaceable multi-layer eye foam
[Stealth & Style] - Subdued colors look great and won't make you a target | Interchangable translucent facemask with pro-level profile
[Proven Features] - Quick change, fog resistant thermal lens with 100% UV protection | Innovative versitile design | Customizable parts across entire VIO II Line
